column1: #Process description for the Pez edition data
#BIBL-VOL2: This process converts the bibliography of the first LIDOS export to MODS.
#BIBL-VOL1: This process converts the bibliography of the first volume of the Pez edition to MODS. (Manually edited in Zotero)

#BIBL-DIFF: Bibliography of volume 2 has been already manually edited in Zotero; bibliography of vol 1 contains some of the records in vol 2 and many new ones. This process extracts the one new ones into a sepearte file that is imported into Zotero and edited manually there
#LETTERS-VOL1: Converts the letters in the first volume of the Pez edition from word to TEI (one document per letter)
#LETTERS-VOL2: Converts the letters in the second volume of the Pez edition from word to TEI (one document per letter) - YET TO BE DONE!
#INDEX-VOL1: Converts the index of volume 1 to a TEI list
#INDEX-VOL2: Converts the index of volume 2 to a TEI list
#INDEX-MERGE: Merges the indexes of volume 1 and 2 into one TEI list. YET TO BE FINISHED!
#PERSONS-ENTITYLINKING: Entity linking of a list of persons to GND, VIAF and CERL
#PERSON-IMAGE-RELATIONS: Creates a list of persons and their related images in UNIDAM
